articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Total solar eclipse April 2024: 10 of the biggest cities within in the path of totality - Space.com
articles.description: On April 8, 2024, over 31 million people in North America will witness a total solar eclipse, around a third of them in just 10 cities.
articles.content:

articles.author: Scoop Harrison
articles.title: Green Day Alters Lyrics to "American Idiot" on New Year's Rockin' Eve - Consequence
articles.description: Green Day's Billie Joe Armstrong altered the lyrics in "American Idiot" to sing, "I'm not a part of the MAGA agenda," during the band’s performance on Ryan Seacrest's New Year's Rockin' Eve.
articles.content: Green Day specifically made a point to avoid making political music as of late, saying that it “takes those special, inspired moments” to write songs in that vein. The band apparently felt that their… [+1190 chars]
